name: Dr. Kid: First Aid and Calamity
name_original: Dr. Kid: First Aid and Calamity
description: We never know when a Calamity is going to attack. Accidents may happen at any moment and in any location, and planning ahead of time is the most excellent approach to avoid unexpected circumstances. In this innovative mobile application for kids, you'll find how to improve your child's safety by controlling accidents and learning basic First Aid. Dr. Kid and Rescuer Princess will guide you on learning First Aid and emergency tips on every stages. Apply your learning on the assessment that you can see after the tutorial and every correct answer there are video demonstration on how to perform it and you will be given a star as your score.
